Material in the Rockefeller family collections that provides the names, correspondence, or activities of living members of the Rockefeller family, and/or documents the net wealth of any Rockefeller family members, is restricted from scholarly access.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access note
accessrestrict.p: Restricted from scholarly access. Material in the Rockefeller family collections that provides the names, correspondence, or activities of living members of the Rockefeller family, and/or documents the net wealth of any Rockefeller family members, is restricted from scholarly access.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access note
accessrestrict.p: Restricted from scholarly access. Material in the Rockefeller family collections that provides the names, correspondence, or activities of living members of the Rockefeller family, and/or documents the net wealth of any Rockefeller family members, is restricted from scholarly access.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes many various correspondences with Hugh Morrow, one of Nelson's advisors and speech-writers, regarding the public affairs relevant to Nelson Rockefeller and Berent Friele's interests.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Contains a note to Friele from Governor Nelson Rockefeller exclaiming his amazement at the fact that seemingly everyone in Brazil is associated with and adores Friele.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes a variety of letters sent mostly from Berent Friele to Nelson Rockefeller as advice and current events primarily focusing on Latin America. Most letters serve as briefs of state business, particularly in the realm of international relations. Contains newspaper clippings. Contains large photo of Nelson and Mrs. Rockefeller accompanying King Frederik IX and Queen Ingrid of Denmark.

separatedmaterial.head: Separated Materials
separatedmaterial.p: Photographs have been physically separated from the original file, and relocated to their own folder.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Correspondence between Nelson Rockefeller and Berent Friele regarding recent elections in Brazil as well as the official US mission to the country.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes correspondence regarding Nelson Rockefeller and Berent Friele's affairs in Ecuador, especially concerning a Hacienda undergoing labor troubles representative of communism. Also includes many letters and correspondences regarding coffee production at Narfarms del Ecuador, a model farm established by Nelson Rockefeller.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: An assortment of letters and news press about Nelson A. Rockefeller's visit to Brazil, particularly concerning his associate, Brazilian news magnate Assis Chateaubriand. Also contains news press about a new military assistance pact between the United States and Brazil. Contains newspaper clippings.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: A large assortment of various letters, correspondence, memos, and speeches generally relating to Nelson Rockefeller and President Medici of Brazil and either written to or by Berent Friele. Notably contains a confidential memorandum by the Conference of Latin American Chancellors for Continental Cooperation on bases for a new dialogue between Latin America and the United States. Also contains eulogy delivered by Nelson at the funeral of his younger brother, Winthrop. Contains newspaper clippings.

did.unittitle: Nelson A. Rockefeller Visit to Brazil

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes an itinerary for Nelson Rockefeller's 1952 visit to Brazil as well as a list of dignitaries with whom he met during his trip. Includes notes for a meeting with future President of Brazil Juscelino Kubitschek.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access note
accessrestrict.p: Restricted from scholarly access. Material in the Rockefeller family collections that provides the names, correspondence, or activities of living members of the Rockefeller family, and/or documents the net wealth of any Rockefeller family members, is restricted from scholarly access.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Correspondence and press related to Janio Quadros, President of Brazil. Notably includes a memorandum to Nelson Rockefeller from Berent Friele containing detailed notes of a meeting between himself and Quadros. Contains newspaper clippings.

did.unittitle: Nelson Rockefeller and President Betancourt Visit

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Correspondence and documents pertaining to the visit of the President of Venezuela Betancourt to the United States and the home of Nelson Rockefeller. Includes notes taken from a press conference upon Betancourt's arrival. Contains newspaper clippings.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Primarily correspondence between Nelson Rockefeller and Berent Friele, but also including several messages to Friele from other associates such as Galo Plaza. Includes newspaper clippings and condolences for death of Nelson's father, John D. Rockefeller Jr. Also includes notable dialogue concerning "Coffee-Wheat and Psychological Warfare" which is plan to import surplus coffee from Brazil into US in exchange for surplus wheat. Includes short biography of Nelson Rockefeller.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: An assortment of letters and messages to and from Nelson A. Rockefeller which primarily concern interests in Latin America.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Assorted letters and messages all relating to the death of Nelson Rockefeller, mostly addressed to Berent Friele.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: A large compilation of various newspaper articles and letters regarding the construction of a memorial to Nelson Rockefeller as well as Claude C. Erb's dissertation on Nelson and US-Latin American affairs. Includes newspaper clippings.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Various memos and notes to Nelson Rockefeller from Berent Friele giving advice and reminding him of important dates.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access note
accessrestrict.p: Restricted from scholarly access. Material in the Rockefeller family collections that provides the names, correspondence, or activities of living members of the Rockefeller family, and/or documents the net wealth of any Rockefeller family members, is restricted from scholarly access.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes speech by Berent Friele delivered at Brazilian-American Chamber of Commerce luncheon and other correspondence regarding US-Brazilian relations.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes newspaper clippings relating to various Rockefeller family members, but primarily Nelson A. Rockefeller. Also focuses in large part on Brazilian efforts to enhance paper and pulp industry.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Contains many documents and letters relating to an organization focused on promoting Hispanic businesses. Also contains letter from a Cuban exile to Nelson Rockefeller who wishes to see Nelson elected to the White House because he believes Nelson can "free Cuba". Many letters asking for support of Nelson Rockefeller for various projects, initiatives, forms of assistance, etc. Includes newspaper clippings.

did.unittitle: Organization of American States and Nelson Rockefeller

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: A variety of correspondence relating to Nelson Rockefeller and his association with bettering relations between the US and Latin America, including many letters from Ecuadorian President Galo Plaza. Contains newspaper clippings.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Assorted letters and messages of a personal nature written most often between Nelson Rockefeller and Berent Friele. Also includes speech by Secretary of State Henry Kissinger in Brazil.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: A letter from Berent Friele to Governor Nelson Rockefeller regarding a party he is hosting which will include Brazilian notables among the guests.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Correspondence and messages relating to a postponed visit to Brazil by Nelson Rockefeller and his wife, Happy. Includes newspaper clippings and photographs.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: A compilation of newspapers with articles on important current events as well as news concerning the Rockefeller family, primarily Nelson. Features an opinion piece about Fidel Castro written in both English and Spanish.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: A large compilation of newspapers in a variety of languages covering press primarily related to Nelson Rockefeller.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes a letter by Friele written on behalf of Nelson Rockefeller which asks for the Soviet ambassador (Anatoliy Dobrynin) to approve a visa for a woman who appealed to him in order to marry a Soviet national.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access note
accessrestrict.p: Restricted from scholarly access. Material in the Rockefeller family collections that provides the names, correspondence, or activities of living members of the Rockefeller family, and/or documents the net wealth of any Rockefeller family members, is restricted from scholarly access.

did.unittitle: The Pan American Society of the United States Inc.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes invitation and photographic newsletter of Pan American Society Gold Medal Luncheon celebrating Nelson Rockefeller. Letters written to Berent Friele typically regarding Pan American Society. Also includes a letter written by Nelson Rockefeller in which he rejects invitation to become Honorary President of the Pan American Society.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Various letters of correspondence concerning Vice President Nelson Rockefeller and usually composed by Berent Friele in communication with associates of his and Nelson's. Many of the letters are requests for assistance in seeking employment and include attached resumes.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: A large file with various forms of correspondence and association between Nelson Rockefeller and Victor Andrade, a Bolivian Ambassador. Includes a lengthy memoir by Andrade on his initial meeting with and friendship with Nelson in which he gives credit to Nelson for pushing the US Government to take an interest in the lives of the Bolivian working class responsible for mining the tin fueling the US war effort in the Second World War. Contains several resumes.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Documents, files, and memoranda pertaining to the many businesses and corporations with which Berent Friele was affiliated. Also focuses on the political activities of Berent Friele, and such activites conducted by Friele on behalf of others. Includes some press articles which focus on these businesses.

did.unittitle: ACCION and Partners of the Americas

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Contains a length minutes report on a meeting held by the board of directors of Accion International as well as other material related to the organization. Also contains material concerning the organization Partners of the Americas. Contains financial statements and figures.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Information on the goings on of AIFLD activities in Brazil primarily concerned with labor-management cooperation among the Brazilians. Contains newspaper clippings.

did.unittitle: American Institute for Free Labor Development

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: An assortment of documents and correspondence related to the AIFLC. Includes newspaper clippings, pamphlets of the organization, and financial statements within director meeting minutes.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Further correspondence and events hosted by the Americas Foundation involving Berent Friele. Contains remarks made by Nelson Rockefeller in 1947 at a dinner honoring President of Mexico Miguel Aleman Valdes.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Contains a pamphlet titled "The Birthday of the Americas Dinner", held by the Americas Foundation, which includes information on the celebration as well as an itinerary for the evening. Contains remarks and speeches pertaining to Alberto Lleras, President of Colombia. Includes newspaper clippings.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: A long, bound memorandum for the company Aracruz Celulose proposing the business plan for a $40,000,000 investment in the company's project, which primarily concerns forestry-work and pulp manufacturing. Includes balance sheets and photographs of Aracruz Celulose's plant in Brazil as well as several unattached photographs of involved person and a pamphlet for the company.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: A packet which details the economic needs of a region of Mexico. Includes newspaper clippings. Also includes the minutes of a meeting of the board of directors of ACCION International.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Materials related to IBEC's endeavors in Brazil including the production of a new seed-hybrid variant of corn to be grown in the agricultural regions of the country.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Contains business correspondence on Interamericana, a finance and investment firm based in South America, including stock returns and other profit statements. Many files contain information on projected profits of investment banks in Latin American countries debate among company directors on best places to establish such banks.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Contains newspaper clippings relating to Berent Friele's interests in Brazil. Includes a pamphlet detailing nuclear energy use in Brazil.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes the translation of a Brazilian bill of law decreeing powers to the executive branch of government over the economy and trade, particularly concerning remittance regulations. Also includes details of a similar bill passed in Colombia. Includes many documents focusing on US investors lobbying for less restriction on foreign investments in Brazil. Includes newspaper clippings.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes news bulletin which states that Brazil has passed a law obliging all manufacturers of rubber goods to invest 20% of their annual profits in planting new rubber trees as well as important news on the passage of a bill focusing on the production of petroleum in Brazil. Includes photograph of Brazilian President Getulio Vargas and newspaper clippings.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes correspondence, newspaper articles, and pamphlets relating to David Rockefeller and his involvement alongside Friele in US-Brazilian relations, including his distinction as being chosen as "Man of the Year" by the Brazilian-American Chamber of Commerce, of which Friele is an Honorary President.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Contains a speech delivered by Berent Friele and hosted by the Brazilian Institute of New York University on US-Brazilian relations.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Features profiles for a compilation of businesses in Brazil, including farms and locations suitable for new business ventures. Includes newspaper clippings.

did.langmaterial: Contains some documents written in Portuguese and newspaper clippings.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Documents, files, and correspondence relating to various aspects of the Brazilian Economy, including a plan to establish wheat fields in a region of the country. Contains a pamphlet entitled Combate a Inflacao: O Valor Do Cruzeiro (Combating Inflation: The Value of the Cruzeiro) as well as a weekly newsletter by the American Chamber of Commerce for Brazil.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Memorandums, news bulletins, and documents of the National Foreign Trade Council pertaining to the repatriation of foreign capital which had been invested in Brazil. Includes newspaper clippings.

did.unittitle: Center for Latin American Relations and Americas Foundation

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Correspondence, news, and meeting minutes concerning a variety of organizations with focuses on US-Latin American relations. Contains newspaper clippings and a speech made by David Rockefeller at one of these meetings.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes letters from Peter Grace, an American industrialist, multi-millionaire, owner of the United Fruit Company, and Chairman of the AIFLD (American Institute of Free Labor Development), to Friele.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Contains meeting minutes for the directors of the Christiania General Insurance Corporation, of which Berent Friele was one, as well as financial statements and budget expenditures.

did.unittitle: Claude C. Erb and Institute of Inter-American Affairs

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Correspondence with an associate of Berent Friele's called Claude Erb as well as other correspondence regarding Erb's dissertation on US-Latin American Relations and Nelson's involvement. Includes newspaper clippings a many postcards and handwritten notes.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Contains a few letters of correspondence written among Claude Erb, David Rockefeller, and Berent Friele concerning Claude's research on Nelson Rockefeller's contributions to US-Latin American relations.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Contains memorandums and correspondence on the production of soluble coffee in Latin America and investment opportunities for the International Basic Economy Corporation. Includes newspaper articles and a pamphlets with details of the coffee industry and its place in the Latin American economy.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: A large compilation of documents, correspondence, and files relating to US-Brazilian relations. Contains newspaper clippings as well as statistics and facts about recent developments in cooperation between the nations. Notably contains a lengthy Harvard University report on nuclear proliferation and Brazil.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Concerns issues which had arisen straining relations between the US and Brazil mainly centered on disagreements over Brazil's moving towards nuclear technology. Includes newspaper clippings and data analysis. Also includes economic report on Brazil as produced by Wells Fargo Bank N.A.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Contains a memorandum discussing the findings of the Council on Foreign relations on political unrest in Latin America, its causes, how it affects US interests, and suggested courses of action towards it. Contains meeting minutes for the council as they discuss their various perspectives on how to approach investment in Latin America given the current political atmosphere. Contains descriptive individual dossiers on several Latin American countries. Heavy focus on preventing spread of communism.

did.unittitle: Council on Foreign Relations Brazil Meeting

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Contains a published report by the Center of Brazilian Studies at The Johns Hopkins University on developments in Brazil as well as a large photograph addressed to Berent Friele. Includes numerous facts and figures as well as memorandums on the state of the Brazilian economy, especially in regard to an energy crisis.

did.unittitle: Council on Foreign Relations Brazil Meeting: Photographs

separatedmaterial.head: Separated Materials
separatedmaterial.p: Photographs have been physically separated from the original file, and relocated to their own folder.

did.unittitle: Council on Foreign Relations US-Brazil Conference

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Contains correspondence with Winston Lord, President of the Council on Foreign Relations, in regards to a meeting hosted by the council on Brazil's future role in international affairs. Also contains a pamphlet on the subject.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Contains a long document detailing D&R's preliminary reports and progress on development of the Brazilian interior.

did.unittitle: Development and Resources Corporation (D&R): Brazil Trip

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Contains correspondence by David E. Lilienthal with various Brazilian politicians involved in the development of the country's interior, primarily concerning Brazil's energy crisis and possible trade for oil and natural gas from Iran. Also concerns information on official visits to Brazil by David Lilienthal as well as Henry Kissinger. Contains newspaper clippings.

did.unittitle: Development and Resources Corporation (D&R): Brazil Visit

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Contains information on visit of David E. Lilienthal to Brazil including documents and itineraries. Also contains large document explaining programs and objectives of the Brazilian Ministry of the Interior as well as documents regarding the promotion of development in the Sao Francisco Region of Brazil. Includes newspaper clippings.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Further correspondence between Berent Friele and David E. Lilienthal with some reference to the increasing displacement of indigenous peoples and destruction of environments in the region of the Amazon Basin. Contains David Lilienthal's resume as well as many handwritten notes. Includes newspaper clippings.

did.unittitle: Development and Resources Corporation (D&R) in Brazil and Iran

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Correspondence, reports, and data relating to the activities of the D&R Corporation in both Brazil and Iran, mainly involved in surveying regions for creating the best possible developments in oil and nuclear energy. Contains newspaper clippings and letters from both Berent Friele and David E. Lilienthal.

did.unittitle: Development and Resources Corporation (D&R): Institutional Aspects

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Contains a lengthy letter memorandum from David E. Lilienthal of the D&R Corporation to the Brazilian Minister of Interior Jos Costa Cavalcanti concerning development of the SFV (Sao Francisco Valley).

did.unittitle: David E. Lilienthal and Berent Friele

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Contains correspondence between Berent Friele and David Lilienthal regarding Brazil as well as an article which offers a commentary on the development of Brazil's agricultural program. Contains documents and National Geographic maps of the region being developed, as well as all of South America.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Letters and messages primarily between Berent Friele and one David E. Lilienthal, founder of the D&R (Development and Resources) Corporation, concerning energy development in Brazil. Contains newspaper clippings.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes magazine article with a brief biography of David Rockefeller, an interview with him, and several photos of him.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Restricted from scholarly access - financial material.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Further correspondence between Berent Friele and David E. Lilienthal, as well as other associaties, concerning current projects undertaken by the D&R Corporation in Brazil. Contains newspaper clippings as well as several business reports. Also includes a packet titled "Unifed Development Plan for the Sao Francisco Valley", a business and goal outline.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Further D&R relaed material on nuclear energy in Brazil with inclusion of technical data and reports. Contains correspondence with one Henry Maksoud, a notable Brazilian businessman as well as newspaper clippings.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Further correspondence between Berent Friele and David E. Lilienthal regarding matters related to the D&R Corporation. Contains newspaper clippings and a magazine feature on David Lilienthal's life.

did.unittitle: Development and Resources Corporation (D&R) in Brazil

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Materials related to the D&R Corporation in Brazil as well as current events in the Brazilian political world such as the rise to power of General Ernesto Geisel and his closest advisors including Golbery do Couto e Silva. Contains newspaper clippings.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes proposal by Rodman Rockefeller detailing his vision for increasing energy independence in the Western Hemisphere utilizing coal, citing the US and Brazil as the two major economic powers and consumers in the hemisphere. Includes newspaper clippings.

did.unittitle: Establishment of Investment Bank in Brazil and IBEC

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: A large and elaborate report compiled by management consulting firm McKinsey & Company for Chase Bank on the founding and establishment of an investment bank in Brazil as well as initial findings. Contains a selection of charts, figures, and statements.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Details of a visit to Brazil taken by Berent Friele and his correspondence with Nelson Rockefeller. Primarily concerns financial details of the trip.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Documents and correspondence relating to the Gould Paper Company, a paper mill based in the US which was considered for purchase by IBEC to help stave off the shortage of newsprint in Brazil at the time.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Further correspondence and files relating to Berent Friele's dealings with the Gould Paper Company, primarily concerning prices of paper sold by the ton and issues over delivery and sale. Much correspondence concerns growing issues between companies Tor Janer and Gould Paper. Includes a lengthy memorandum to the board of directors of the Gould Paper Company. Contains many telegrams and newspaper clippings.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Further correspondence and files relating to Berent Friele's dealings with the Gould Paper Company, primarily concerning prices of paper sold by the ton and issues over delivery and sale. Includes many reports of financial statements and stock prices for the company as well as contractual agreements among one Tor Janer, IBEC, and the Gould Paper Company itself.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Contains letters, messages, and correspondence to and from Berent Friele primarily of a business nature and relating to IBEC (International Basic Economy Corporation). Includes a multitude of articles and papers with information of the internal workings of organizations Berent Friele cooperated with.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Several news articles focusing on IBEC, a Rockefeller company. Contains newspaper clippings as well as a large informational pamphlet for the organization Agroceres.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes a proposed agenda for IBEC in improving coffee processing in Brazil. Contains a budget sheet for the proposed studies as well as newspaper clippings.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Assortment of documents and correspondence regarding IBEC and its failed deal to join forces with a company called Anderson, Clayton & Cia which would have funded IBEC's "basic horticultural research program in coffee".

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: A compilation of meeting minutes and financial statements for the Indussa Corporation for which Berent Friele was a director. Also contains a portfolio of stockholders and the stock price and capitalization of stock in Indussa corporation.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Contains documents relating to IBEC's involvement in the Brazilian Plastics Project or Plax do Brasil, including financial statements and projected earnings. Also contains earnings and financial statement for Emhart Manufacturing Company.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Contains memorandums and bulletins by the Inter-American Council of Commerce and Production focusing on the investment interests of various companies and nationalities in the Republics of Latin America. Includes assorted listings of these countries and their primary investments in the countries of Latin America. Includes pamphlets.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Contains estimated profits and sales for Cimento Aratu, S.A., a cement company established by investors of the Interamericana Corporation. Includes memorandum on company financing. Includes a map of Brazil and important areas of the cement industry there.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Meeting notes for IRI Council. Projected income sheets for different industries. Balance sheet, income statement, etc. for IRI.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Meeting notes for IRI Board of Directors. Information regarding an IRI project based in Oman and correspondence relating to it. Several photos in project outline. IRI research findings on effects of liming and fertilizing several crops on Campo Cerrado Soils.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Binder which details the agricultural projects undertaken by IRI and planned initiatives.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes a summary of Janer orders for paper from the Gould Paper Company. Also includes a letter from the Gould Paper Compant to Janer critical of Janer's failure to comply with their contractual agreements and defaulting on payments.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: An assortment of correspondences and articles regarding "neglected" US relations with the Latin American countries. Includes large portrait-style photograph of Nelson A. Rockefeller and newspaper clippings. Also includes Department of State release expressing the US Government's regret at a postponed meeting of foreign ministers by the Argentinean Government.

separatedmaterial.head: Separated Materials
separatedmaterial.p: Photographs have been physically separated from the original file, and relocated to their own folder.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Correspondence and files relating to US foreign policy towards Latin America, especially in regards to Cuba. Many materials focusing on OAS (Organization of American States). Includes newspaper clippings.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Further correspondence regarding the labor boycotts taking place throughout Latin America. Includes statistics on treatment of trade union leaders and rights in many countries with particular interest in Chile. Includes newspaper clippings and mentions David Rockefeller in a pamphlet regarding the Meeting of the Council of the Americas.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Contains itinerary for state visit of Brazilian President Emlio Mdici to the United States.

did.unittitle: Mesbla S.A. and Luiz La Saigne

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: An assortment of correspondence and fact sheets focusing on the profits and financials of Meslba S.A. primarily with one Luiz La Saigne, a Brazilian businessman.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Documents and correspondence on the affairs of the National Foreign Trade Council primarily concerning US investments in Brazil, but also including other Latin American countries. Includes statistics and charts. Includes copies of Latin American governments' bills establishing the powers of government over trade.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes memorandum for IBEC's New Business Committee which focuses on new projects in developing countries such as establishing factories and encouraging new investments. Also includes proposals for short-term financing from IBEC to new companies in Brazil in which IBEC is interested in financing. Includes special memorandum on how to address problem of shortage of newsprint in Latin America.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Press and correspondence concerning US-Bolivian relations, particularly regarding the visit of the Bolivian ambassador to the United States as well as the re-election of Bolivian President Victor Paz Estenssoro. Contains newspaper clippings.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Pertains to a conference held at New York University on matters of US-Brazilian interests. Includes a pamphlet briefing on the history of US-Brazilian relations as well as important facts about Brazil's economy.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: A compilation of newspaper clippings relating to foreign investment in Brazil and import/export trade.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Contains a large compilation of newspaper clippings, regarding current events and relations between the United States and Brazil. Contains several photographs of Berent Friele himself.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Contains correspondence, news bulletins, and documents concerning a drought in northeastern Brazil and its detrimental effects on the people there. Contains newspaper clippings.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Correspondence and documents relating to Oivind Lorentzen, a Norwegian shipping company, named eponymously for its founder, with large amounts of business in shipping to and from Latin American countries, particularly Brazil. Primarily concerning factories to be built in Brazil for oil refinement. Many documents written in Brazilian Portuguese. Contains newspaper clippings.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: An assortment of invitations, guest-lists, and itineraries for various official dinners and luncheons held by organizations associated with Berent Friele. Includes a couple of extravagantly decorated dinner invitations, notably one to a dinner in honor of Crown Prince Harald V of Norway.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Correspondence between Berent Friele and other associates of the OAS, particularly Galo Plaza, regarding the activities and goals of the organization.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: A report compiled by management consulting firm Booz Allen & Hamilton for the president of Tenco, Inc. on the organization of the corporation and how to promote further efficiency through reorganization. Includes an independent letter addressed in part to Berent Friele which determines the corporation chooses to accept the proposals outlined in the report. Contains facts and statistics.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: A large bound memorandum for the company Aracruz Celulose composed by engineering consulting company Jaakko Poyry & Co. The report details the future plans of the company to create a plant in Brazil specializing in making pulp from eucalyptus trees. Contains many profit sheets and financial statements.

did.unittitle: President-Elect Costa e Silva and Brazilian Congressional Group New York Visit

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Details of President-Elect Costa e Silva's 1967 visit to New York as well as the Brazilian Congressional Group's 1963 visit. Includes itineraries and correspondence.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: A large compilation of press articles relating to Latin American affairs pertaining to the doings of Berent Friele and IBEC. Includes newspaper clippings.

did.unittitle: Proposal to Minister of Interior of Brazil for Consulting Services

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: A memorandum by the D&R (Development and Resources Corporation) containing proposed action to be undertaken by the Brazilian Government in developing the resources of the Sao Francisco Valley Region.

did.unittitle: Relatorio Da Comissao Brasiliero-Americana de Producao de Generos Alimenticios

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Contains reports on the activities of the Comissao Brasiliero-Americana de Producao de Generos Alimenticios agency of the Brazilian Ministry of Agriculure for Nelson Rockefeller as president of the Coordinator of Inter-American Affairs (CIAA) and Dr. Apolonio Sales as Minister of Agriculture for Brazil. Contains photographs of people involved in project as well as statistics and statements.

did.unittitle: Relatorio Da Comissao Brasiliero-Americana de Producao de Generos Alimenticios

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Contains reports on the activities of the Comissao Brasiliero-Americana de Producao de Generos Alimenticios agency of the Brazilian Ministry of Agriculure for Nelson Rockefeller as president of the Coordinator of Inter-American Affairs (CIAA) and Dr. Apolonio Sales as Minister of Agriculture for Brazil. Contains photographs of people involved in project as well as statistics and statements.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: A massive compilation files documenting a great variety of statistics and facts about Brazil as well as information on a presidential mission to Brazil.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Contains documents pertaining to the Rockefeller Mission to Latin America, most notably a letter from President Richard Nixon thanking Berent Friele for his contributions to the mission. Includes newspaper clippings and pamphlet entitled "The Vision Letter" with details of the Rockefeller Report on Latin America.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes memos and messages, usually to Rodman Rockefeller from Friele, regarding agricultural research and its potential practical applications in Brazil by virtue of the International Basic Economy Corporation, of which Rodman was Vice President. Includes newspaper clippings and letters in Brazilian Portuguese.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Outline of Rodman Rockefeller's itinerary with many meetings with Brazilian notables.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Correspondence letters detailing Rodman Rockefeller's travels to Brazil and communication with Friele expressing enthusiasm for continuing Rockefeller family interest in bettering US-Brazilian relations into the next generation. Also includes some itineraries from the trip and a sketch of a ?population pyramid' outlining the research being performed by the RCR Group in Brazil on population demographics.

did.unittitle: Rodman Rockefeller Visit to Brazil Clips

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Articles and newspaper clippings, mostly in Brazilian Portuguese, related to Rodman Rockefeller's visit to Brazil including his meeting with Brazilian President Emlio Mdici.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Correspondence, meeting notes, and other material relating to Scandinavian Airlines System (SAS), on which Berent Friele was a member of the board of directors. Includes several pamphlets and published reports detailing the logistics and financial statements of the corporation. Includes photographs of airline directors and planes.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Pamphlets and advertisements for the Ski for Light Program. Includes many pictures of program in magazine.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Contains a multitude of newspaper clippings and a handwritten memo on production of sulfur in Brazil.

did.unittitle: Summary of Findings and Recommendations of IBEC

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: A report on a study of the International Basic Economy Corporation undertaken by McKinsey & Company for the president of IBEC, Nelson A. Rockefeller. Includes recommendations on how to improve efficiency and profitability in the organization as well as facts and figures.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Contains documents and correspondence relating to the US Council of the International Chamber of Commerce dealing in particular with trade barriers and free exchange of goods between countries. Contains pamphlets on trade barriers and red tape as well as proposals to end them. Also contains a memorandum titled "A Study of Conditions Affecting Foreign Direct Investment" which outlines factors in effective investment in Brazil.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Contains more documents related to the US Council of the International Chamber of Commerce including meeting minutes and another copy of the memorandum included in the previous folder. Includes newspaper and magazine articles on the subject.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Contains correspondence and business documents pertaining to the US Machinery Co. and its activities in Brazil.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Continued correspondence by Friele and David Rockefeller concerning tightening of relations between US and Brazil. Also includes short biography of David Rockefeller highlighting his achievements as Chairman of Chase Manhattan Bank, specifically those related to the company's affairs in Latin America.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Numerous reports, statistics, and letters concerning the state of US-Brazilian relations, mostly compiled by the Commission on United States-Brazilian Relations, as well as reports on the economy of Brazil. Contains newspaper clippings.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: A packet which contains information relating the historical relationship between the United States and the Latin American countries as well as contemporary information and future plans for that relationship.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Contains correspondence between Berent Friele and associates relating to a variety of companies with which Friele is either conducting business or a part of. Contains a short biography/resume of Berent Friele as well as one Marshall Saunders. Includes newspaper clippings.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Further assortment of press articles on the subject of current events and affairs in Latin America. Includes newspaper clippings.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes letters to and from both Nelson Rockefeller and Berent Friele. Notably includes letter written from Nelson to then President of Venezuela Carlos A. Perez. Also includes several letters expressing sorrow for the loss of several associates of Nelson and Friele. Details included about a new Caracas-Brasilia dialogue concerning trade between the two states.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Contains details, itineraries, and schedules relating to the visit of Brazilian politician Aureliano Chaves to the United States and their relation to Nelson Rockefeller. Contains a note relating to a meeting between Chaves, Nelson Rockefeller, and David Rockefeller.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Photographs and images, some of which were separated from other series within the body of the collection.
The description for those photographs that were separated from other series appears elsewhere in this guide, as a unique photographs entry placed within the applicable orginal file.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Photographs of cityscapes from a Brazilian city, gifted to Nelson Rockefeller.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Photo album of various events and people relating to the Rockefeller family, primarily focusing on Brazil and its fishing industry. Contains a letter from Nelson Rockefeller to an associate regarding the International Basic Economy Corporation.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Permission is required in order to publish or otherwise use photographs and other visual materials of living members of the Rockefeller family. See RAC Head of Reference for details.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: A large compilation of photographs of the Steven Rockefeller wedding to Anne-Marie Rasmussen.
